name: Writing and Rhetoric
descriptions: The Writing and Rhetoric minor develops professional writing, rhetorical analysis, and digital communication skills. Students take 18 hours across three required subcategories plus electives.
Requires 9 hours at the upper-division level. Excludes ENGL 10803.

courses: 3 hours from the Writing and Publishing subcategory
3 hours from the Rhetorics and Cultures subcategory
3 hours from the Digital Rhetorics and Design subcategory

electiveCourses.description: 9 hours from any courses in the three subcategories above or any upper-division WRIT, CRWT, or ENGL courses.
